info.description: This is an autogenerated swagger REST API gui for Floorplan To Blender server. The rest api utilizes remote method invokations. See more at [https://github.com/grebtsew/FloorplanToBlender3d]
info.title: Swagger Floorplan To Blender Rest Api

tags.name: FloorplanToBlender
tags.description:
RMI functions for handling Floorplan To Blender Rest Api Server. 
Request Version : HTTP/1.1
Server Version : BaseHTTP/0.6
System Version : Python/3.8.10
Protocol Version : HTTP/1.0
Supported Image Formats : ['.png', '.jpg', '.jpeg', '.tiff', '.bmp', '.gif']
Supported Blender Formats : ['.obj', '.x3d', '.gltf', '.mtl', '.webm', '.blend', '.vrml', '.usd', '.udim', '.stl', '.svg', '.dxf', '.fbx', '.3ds']
